notes: modal verb; irregular present (devo, devi, deve, dobbiamo, dovete, devono); past participle 'dovuto'; usually with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_italian: Non mi piace dovere spiegare tutto.
example_sentence_english: I do not like to have to explain everything.
I am having to redo the numbers.

translation_english: I had to/I was supposed to
example_sentence_english: I had to call you yesterday.

translation_english: you had to/you were supposed to
example_sentence_english: You were supposed to tell me.

translation_english: he had to/she had to/you (formal) had to
we had to/we were supposed to
you (plural) had to/you (plural) were supposed to
example_sentence_english: You (plural) had to arrive at eight.

translation_english: they had to/they were supposed to
